title: Who blocked me on Viber? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here's various things you can do, since you have got lot of time since you are blocked:1) You can learn guitar: learn guitar - YouTube2) You can learn cycling (No links for this, practice hard and learn yourself)3) You can clean your drawers and find lots of interesting unused stuff4) You can learn driving from any authorized training institute5) You can go to gym and build a better yourself6) You can learn dancing7) You can learn cooking, and eat it yourself8) You can learn to bake cakes, my birthday is quite near9) You can learn to make a paper boat from a notebook paper10) You can eat mangoes, if season isn't there, you can drink Frooti or Slice11) You can develop your social skills12) You can learn things that actually make you successful:   13) You can go out and help out people14) You can volunteer to make our country better15) You can take any initiative and gather people for a social cause16) You can improve your typing speed by playing online typing games: TypeRacer - the global typing competition17) You can restructure your question grammatically pleasant "What shall I do if someone blocks me?"18) You can read all these once again

You have a few alternative to find out.  1. Send the person a massage from a different number on viber and see if it shows "seen" under your massage. 2. If seen that means he/she has not turned her "Send "seen" Statues" off. Now you know that when you send him/her a massage from your number but it does not show "seen" but shows only "delivered" that means he/she has blocked you.3. You can also know that by his/her profile picture. If he/she has blocked you, you can only see her/his profile picture of the time when he/she blocked you and it never changes. Add her/him in another viber number and see what profile picture it shows there. That will show different one if he/she changes his/her profile.4. If he/she has blocked you, you giver him/her a call from viber and it shows "Calling" not "Ringing". :) good luck
